refnamediv.refpurpose: An overview of the public interfaces provided by the Node Startup Controller

refsect1.title: Interface for LUC management
refsect1.para: Registration of applications with the LUC is possible through the org.genivi.NodeStartupController1.NodeStartupController D-Bus service interface implemented by the Node Startup Controller.
This interface is described in-depth on a dedicated documentation page.

refsect1.title: Interface for legacy application handling
refsect1.para: Legacy applications can be registered with the GENIVI lifecycle subsystem using the legacy-app-handler helper executable, which, like the D-Bus interface, is described on a dedicated page.
